summary:
As a native speaker I specialise in training business English and hold the following two key qualifications:
Cambridge University "Certificate in English Language Teaching to Adults"
London Chamber of Commerce and Industry "Further Certificate for Teachers of Business English" (with distinction)

In addition I have extensive training experience, in a UK business environment, having held training positions at Mars Confectionery (UK) Ltd. and as a franchisee for Allied Dunbar Financial Services (subsequently a division of Zurich Assurance).

Since 2005 I have used this experience to offer English language training to business professionals here in the Netherlands, both as one to one coaching and group courses. In both cases I believe it is vital to improve an individual's confidence by improving their knowledge of English in a business environment and then utilising this knowledge to enhance their performance when conducting business, in English, with both native and non-native speakers.

During this time I have been able to help individuals in a wide range of different sectors including:

Business Consultants & Advisers
Financial Services (Banking, Insurance, Investment & Accounting)
Food processing
Governmental Departments & Institutions
ICT
Industrial Manufacturing
Legal (General, Corporate & International)
Media & Communications
Real Estate Management
Retailing
Telecommunications
Universities

Being based centrally in the Baarn area I am able to consider courses across the whole of the Netherlands.

profile_positions.description: Self-employed Financial Advisor with full autonomy for the day to day running of a successful franchise. Key areas include business planning, managing financial targets, marketing and setting/achieving sales targets. In addition my experience includes that of a Field Sales Coach accompanying Financial Advisors on client meetings to ensure implementation of the Financial Services Authority regulatory guidelines and implementation of ongoing training programmes.
profile_positions.title: Financial Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Field Sales Manager (seconded to CPM International plc) responsible for a team of seven Sales Managers controlling a team of approximately ninety Sales Merchandisers across southern England. Responsibility of operation included recruiting, training and monitoring of subordinates to achieve performance targets agreed with Sales Director. Developed and instigated “Training to Train” programme for subordinates with continual monitoring of results to improve departments effectiveness. Ongoing control of agreed budgets including planning and organising monthly training meetings and annual sales conferences.

Regional Account Manager managing a portfolio of key account contacts including Tesco, Woolworth, Boots and the Co-op. Key performance areas included negotiation of local display and promotional agreements to maximise sales.

Sales Representative managing a territory of multiple retail outlets comprising of many of the key UK retailers (Sainsbury, Tesco, Asda, Boots and Woolworth) with responsibility to negotiate local display agreements and implement nationally agreed standards thus ensuring company quality standards maintained.
